body.name: Oat Protein & Henna Deep Cleansing Shampoo, 32oz
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 26 mins
FREE pickup Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 26 mins
features: Deep Cleansing and Purifying: Our Oat Protein and Henna Deep Cleansing Shampoo is a first lather shampoo filled with natural ingredients to deeply penetrate and cleanse the hair of any impurities without stripping it of it's natural oils
Promotes Healthy Hair and Scalp: Gentle, alcohol free, non stripping formula for men, women and children can be used daily to revitalize hair and scalp; Silicone, sulfate and cruelty free
Key Natural Ingredients: Features hydrolyzed oat protein that conditions and increases hydration; Henna adds volume, shine, and strengthens hair making it more resilient to damage and breakage

Great for All Hair Types: Promotes fuller, thicker, stronger hair for women, men, and children with natural waves and coils, straight and relaxed strands, color treated hair, locs, and gray hair; Previously known as Organic Cleanse Deep Cleansing Shampoo

Design Essentials: Everyone deserves to feel beautiful and confident; With over 30 years experience, trust Design Essentials to empower you to look and feel your best; Every purchase is backed by the Design Essentials guarantee
body.description: Design Essentials Oat protein & henna fuller, thicker, stronger deep cleansing shampoo is a first lather shampoo, filled with natural ingredients that deeply cleanses the hair of any impurities without stripping it of its natural oils. Our oat protein & henna shampoo Contains two key natural botanicals: hydrolyzed oat protein- a natural humectant proven to condition and increase hydration; and henna adds volume, shine, and strengthens hair making it more resilient to damage and breakage. Great for fine, thinning, or limp hair textures. Gentle enough for all hair types and can be used weekly as needed resulting is clean, healthy hair with increased volume and manageability.how-to-use in 5 easy steps: step 1: wet the hair.Step 2: Apply a quarter-size amount of Oat protein & henna deep cleansing shampoo into the palm of the Hand and emulsify.Step 3: Apply to hair and lather.Step 4: Rinse thoroughly.Step 5: Repeat as necessary.Water (Aqua), Sodium lauryl sulfate, Sodium Lauretha Sulfate, cocaminopropylamine oxide, glycol Stearate (and) Laureth-4 (and) Cocamidopropyl Betaine, propylene glycol (and) Diazolidinyl Urea (and) Methylparaben (and) Propylparaben, glycol Stearate, fragrance (Parfum), propylene glycol, PEG 75 lanolin, Hydroxyethylcellulose, hydrolyzed oat protein, Citric Acid, disodium EDTA, calendula officinal flower extract, Goldenseal (Hydrastis canadensis), Lawsonia Inermis (henna) extract, Humulus lupulus (hops) extract, Equisetum arvense (horsetail)extract, Prunus Serotina bark extract, Quillaia saponaria bark extract, Matricaria chamomilla (chamomile) oil, Sodium chloride.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Oat Protein & Henna Deep Cleansing Shampoo Rosemary & Mint Stimulating Super Moisturizing Conditioner Therapeutics Anti-Itch Hair & Scalp Treatment Sleek MAX Edge Control Regimen step: Cleanse Condition Treat Style Why use it? Deep cleansing removes buildup and residue, promoting scalp health Quickly penetrates, softens and revitalizes the hair and the scalp. Alleviates dry, itchy scalp and controls flaking caused by conditions such as dandruff or seborrheic dermatitis. Provides touchable hold and adds intense shine Best for: 1A-4C hair 1A-4C hair 1A-4C hair 1A-4C hair Additional Classic products within this step: Honey Creme Moisture Retention Super Detangling Conditioning Shampoo Almond Butter Express Instant Moisturizing Conditioner Herbal Complex 4 Hair & Scalp Treatment Compositions Foaming Wrap Lotion

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very good clean to hair and scalp

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great salon quality at home
reviews.reviewText: I love these products. My friend and hairdresser uses these at the salon. I really enjoy having them at home to wash my hair. My husband likes them too. Smells so good even days after washing my hair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great for cleaning dreads! My stylist use to use this on me and I love the smell, I do my hair myself now.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My locs loveee this stuff
reviews.reviewText: This shampoo along with their avocado moisturizing shampoo together is the perfect duo . Makes my hair soft and not brittle. I couldn’t believe my hair WASNT HARD.. I have locs so it’s really important to wash them as locs attract everything . Will never use another brand this is it for me . Their other shampoos are just as great . Just a heads up though if you have locs make sure u wash everything out !! This is a shampoo that goes a long way .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product, Delivery terrible
reviews.reviewText: I love the product. I have made several suggestions to Amazon about shipping this product. Ice had the pump broke the, the shampoo spill in the box, and now the pump wasn't twisted securely enough and the shampoo leaked inside the plastic. I just don't understand. It's just not even worth having them send a replacement because I tried that too it was just as sad. Amazon... so innovative but ya'll have not managed to figure this out...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 30, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The perfect shampoo for me.
reviews.reviewText: I have curly hair that tangles almost by default, with greasy roots and dry tips. This is the only cleansing shampoo that doesn't completely strip my hair of all oils.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for locs
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been loc’d for 3.5 years and I love this shampoo. It lathers so well and doesn’t leave any buildup. If you have locs, this is the shampoo for you. Will keep purchasing again and again.

This shampoo doesn’t leave any buildups in my locs. It doesn’t sud like the other shampoos, but you’ll definitely see what it is doing when it lift all the toxins out of the hair, especially if you used oily products to moisturizer the hair. You’ll see all those being lifted, and by giving it a second wash after your first rinse, then you’ll start to see the shampoo starting to sud like normal shampoo. This indicates that it has less reactants such as oily products in the hair to combat with. This is a great shampoo indeed, and I’ll be sticking to this product once the price doesn’t go up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 6, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: It does what it says, absolutely awesome
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to use on my locs and I didn’t regret it, leaves my hair squeaky clean and soft at the same time

I purchased this shampoo after seeing it was often recommended as a great clarifying shampoo by ppl with locs. I have interlocked, 4B hair, and this shampoo properly cleanses my scalp and locs without drying them out. I was twice with this shampoo and once with a moisturizing shampoo, and my hair feels fantastic.
Siento mi cabello más limpio y sano no lo uso diario lo alterno con uno de Keratina cuando no está tan sucio pero soy médico y después de una guardia pesada me limpia hasta el alma

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Cleans my locs so well, removes buildup so easily. The weird thing is I had to break the pump to even use it.
